mapper.select: WITH YEAR_SAL AS (SELECT TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE,'YYYY') REG_DATE, CASE U.CRE_GRD_CODE WHEN 'C01' THEN S.PAY * 0.15 WHEN 'C02' THEN S.PAY * 0.1 ELSE S.PAY * 0.05 END PAY FROM SUGANG S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID WHERE S.TLSN_ST_CODE != 'SU03' AND L.CRE_ID = #{id}) SELECT L.YEAR, ROUND(SUM(Y.PAY)/10000,0) PAY ,COUNT(Y.PAY) CNT FROM YEAR_SAL Y RIGHT JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') - LEVEL +1 AS YEAR FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') - LEVEL - 2008) L ON Y.REG_DATE = L.YEAR GROUP BY ROLLUP(L.YEAR) ORDER BY L.YEAR

WITH MON_SAL AS (SELECT TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE,'MM') MON, CASE U.CRE_GRD_CODE WHEN 'C01' THEN S.PAY * 0.15 WHEN 'C02' THEN S.PAY * 0.1 ELSE S.PAY * 0.05 END PAY FROM SUGANG S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID WHERE TO_CHAR(S.REG_DATE,'YYYY') = #{selectYear} AND S.TLSN_ST_CODE != 'SU03' AND L.CRE_ID = #{id}) SELECT L.MONTH, ROUND(SUM(Y.PAY)/10000,0) PAY ,COUNT(Y.PAY) CNT FROM MON_SAL Y RIGHT JOIN (SELECT LPAD(LEVEL,2,0) MONTH FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) L ON Y.MON = L.MONTH GROUP BY ROLLUP(L.MONTH) ORDER BY L.MONTH

WITH LEC_TOTAL AS (SELECT L.TTL, CASE U.CRE_GRD_CODE WHEN 'C01' THEN S.PAY * 0.15 WHEN 'C02' THEN S.PAY * 0.1 ELSE S.PAY * 0.05 END PAY FROM SUGANG S JOIN LECTURE L ON S.LT_NO = L.LT_NO JOIN USERS U ON L.CRE_ID = U.ID WHERE S.TLSN_ST_CODE != 'SU03'
AND TRUNC(s.reg_date) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND TRUNC(s.reg_date) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
AND L.CRE_ID = #{id}) SELECT TTL,ROUND(SUM(PAY)/10000,0) PAY, COUNT(TTL) CNT FROM LEC_TOTAL GROUP BY ROLLUP(TTL)
